page.title: 08 EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Farming is very important in this area and there are many fields. Both animal and arable farming is prevalent. Harnage Grange owns three combine harvesters and there is a considerable amount of arable farming. This large farm also keeps cows, sheep, pheasants and bees. However, farmers are employing fewer labourers than previously and so many people work outside the area. There are no factories (roads are very narrow for heavy vehicles), garages or engineering works. Dentists and Doctors are based at Cressage and much Wenlock but do visit when necessary. Although, nationally, the employment situation is difficult, it does not seem to be a problem here and both men and women work in a variety of jobs, if not farming, from chemist to kitchen designer.
